sentences.en: A confluence of artistry, superb choreography, and stage design.
sentences.cn: 艺术技巧 、 优美的舞蹈和舞台设计的融合.

sentences.en: Choreography of humans and robots will be scored separately, etc.
sentences.cn: 机器人和队员的舞蹈编排分开评分等.

sentences.en: Does it bother you that they still use your original choreography?
sentences.cn: 他们还在跳你的原创舞蹈,你难受 吗 ?

sentences.en: Foundation Choreography – Learn the choreography that unites all PURE chapters internationally.
sentences.cn: 基础舞蹈——学会舞蹈设计去把各种单纯的舞蹈动作结合起来.

sentences.en: His style of choreography is flamboyant.
sentences.cn: 他的舞蹈设计风格是复杂夸张的.

sentences.en: Judging Criteria: Technique, choreography, musicality, creativity, overall performance and etc.
sentences.cn: 评审准则: 节奏掌握 、 技巧展现 、 舞台及个人风格, 总体表现等.

sentences.en: Observing the moving body: dance, gym, choreography and performance: expression of lightness.
sentences.cn: 不雅察运动的躯体: 舞蹈 、 体操 、 舞蹈和演出: 自由而轻巧.

sentences.en: Piers Morgan: The choreography is genius.
sentences.cn: 皮尔斯: 舞蹈设计者是天才.

sentences.en: Service choreography on the other hand is more collaborative in nature.
sentences.cn: 另一方面,服务编排具有更多的协作性质.

sentences.en: The choreography mixes swing dancing and acrobatics with the ballet influence.
sentences.cn: 该剧的舞蹈混合了摇摆舞、杂技,并受到了芭蕾舞的影响.

sentences.en: The choreography of Eric Hawkins is considered radical by ballet audiences.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞观众认为埃里克·霍金斯的舞蹈设计非常前卫。

sentences.en: The choreography respects the subject - matter.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈设计应顾及舞蹈的主题.

sentences.en: Today, choreography is an essential component of many performing arts.
sentences.cn: 当今, 舞蹈编排已成为诸多表演艺术的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: Tommy Tune gives the choreography his usual class and zip.
sentences.cn: 汤米·图恩在编排的舞蹈中注入其一贯的优雅和活力。

sentences.en: Wade's choreography exceeded the predictions and won an Emmy Award in 2008.
sentences.cn: 韦德的编舞出人意料的赢得了2008年的艾美奖.

trans.tran_en: the art of arranging how dancers should move during a performance
